content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not reach an agreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason we did not reach an agreement is that we could not find a price that was satisfactory to both parties. I was looking for a fair price considering the size of the apartment and its location, while Peter was aiming for the highest price possible for his investment.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10 because they were respectful, straightforward, and willing to compromise during the negotiation process. They also made it clear from the beginning what they were looking for, which helped to keep the negotiation focused and productive.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
